subject: Maybe this is clearer?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_2499_2db3_7380
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I don;t like the way the image looks after converting to jpeg, all smudgy, 
so I'm seeing if zipping is more better. I used Freezip.

This one is re-drawn from scratch, using the original trangle generator 
schematic I found on line for reference. I added the output buffer, made the 
frequency adjustable, and use a different chip for it. This is what I do for 
all my circuits, modifying as needed.

The point of this circuit is to use Retro Dave's limear tuning experiment 
with voltage tunable radios, incase anyone has one like I use lying 
around.......doh. Think I'm going to have to do a proceedure on modifying an 
existing radio for voltage tuning.

Frank
